file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged lines (requests.post and requests.get) are used to obtain authentication tokens from Azure Managed Service Identity (MSI) endpoints, which are either local (localhost) or well-known Azure IPs (169.254.169.254). The endpoints and payloads are consistent with official Azure SDKs and documentation. There is no evidence of exfiltration to attacker-controlled or suspicious domains, no obfuscation, no code execution from remote sources, and all network communication is for legitimate authentication purposes. The code is part of a well-known, open-source Azure authentication library, and all network operations are transparent, documented, and limited to Azure infrastructure. Therefore, the tool's detection is a false positive, likely triggered by the generic pattern of sending data over HTTP, without context of the legitimate use case.
